titleStmt.title: Here is declared the manner of the naming of children in the old time without a priest sprinkling them with water which now is, and hath been in these times, yet they have the Scriptures, but shew their contrary walking to Scripture, and also the practice of the holy men of God by Scripture ... / by G.F.
titleStmt.author: Fox, George, 1624-1691.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
